name: Claudia P.B. Dellavia
text: Dentist, Professor of Human Anatomy at the Department of Biomedical, Surgical and Dental Sciences of the University of Milan.

name: Federica Musto
text: Dentist, PhD in Morphological Sciences at the University of Milan. She is co-author of various publications in international journals.

name: Redento Peretta
text: Doctor Surgeon spec. Odontostomatology, Orthodontics and Morphological Sciences. Professor in Orthodontics School of Specialization in Maxillofacial Surgery and at the advanced course of Craniomandibular Disorders of the University of Padua.

name: Francesco Rosati
text: Dental technician. He lectures and courses in various congresses. Speaker at the Department of Human Anatomy of the University of Milan directed by Professor Chiarella Sforza

name: Riccardo Rosati
text: Dentist, PhD in Morphological Sciences at the University of Milan. Author of scientific publications in international journals.
